meaningMnemonic: Take a <radical>mole</radical> out of its <radical>hole</radical> and it will <kanji>suffocate</kanji>. They need to be in tight quarters, unlike us humans. So when you take one out of its nice, safe hole, it thinks it can't breathe and suffocates.
readingMnemonic: As the mole <kanji>suffocate</kanji>s it <reading>cheats</reading> (ちつ) and shoves its head into your closed hand. You realize what it's doing and squeeze your hand tighter so it's more like a hole. You can feel the mole breathing again now.
